attributes.action: pay special constable the same way retained fire fighters or members of the TA are paid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present Special constables are unpaid . They are committed people who serve there county constabularies making a real difference to the policing hours you see on your towns and roads every month .They have the same powers and take the same risks as regular officers and as we have seen sadly in the passed pay with there lives .It is about time these special people received the recognition they deserve.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "pay special constable the same way retained fire fighters or members of the TA are paid."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11991.asp
